channel.title: Endpoints on Dexter
channel.description: Recent content in Endpoints on Dexter

item.title: Endpoint Security
item.description:
Hello guys and today I will share with you some breif points that I was able to come up with on Endpoint security where we will talk about how endpoint security works and the various types of endpoint security solutions. With that said let us get into it.

Introduction

Endpoints are physical devices that connect to and exchange information with a computer network. Some of these examples include, mobile devices, desktop computers, virtual machines, embedded devices and servers. This can then lead to defining what endpoint security. Endpoint security or rather endpoint protection is the cyber security approach to defending endpoints
